actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

official_title: To require the Financial Literacy and Education Commission to convene a special meeting with respect to the COVID-19 emergency, to update the Commission's website with tools to help individuals recover from any financial hardship as a result of the COVID-19 emergency, and for other purposes.
short_title: Financial Literacy Education Commission Emergency Response Act
subjects: Emergency medical services and trauma care

summary.text:
Financial Literacy Education Commission Emergency Response Act 

This bill requires the Financial Literacy and Education Commission in the Department of the Treasury to convene a special meeting related to the financial impacts of the COVID-19 (i.e., coronavirus disease 2019) emergency. The commission must provide on its website resources to help individuals recover from financial hardships related to the COVID-19 emergency.

titles.title: Financial Literacy Education Commission Emergency Response Act

To require the Financial Literacy and Education Commission to convene a special meeting with respect to the COVID-19 emergency, to update the Commission's website with tools to help individuals recover from any financial hardship as a result of the COVID-19 emergency, and for other purposes.
